alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Dougherty; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dougherty, eastern Mitchell, northeastern Baker, western Colquitt and southwestern Worth Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Putney, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Pelham, Putney, Camilla, Albany, Baconton, Doerun, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Flint, Parkerville, Cotton, Lester, Sigsbee, Pritchetts and Poplar Arbor Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
